stimulusHtml: Which of the following cases decided whether a state could compel children to attend school beyond eighth grade even if it violated the studentsâ€™ sincerely held religious beliefs?
choicesHtml: United States v. Lopez (1995)
Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka (1954)

Wisconsin v. Yoder (1972)
